subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: For the second consecutive day, a German club thoroughly outplayed a Spanish one. Borussia Dortmund defeated Real Madrid, 4-1, Wednesday, a day after Bayern Munich topped Barcelona, 4-0.
snippet: For the second consecutive day, a German club thoroughly outplayed a Spanish one. Borussia Dortmund defeated Real Madrid, 4-1, Wednesday, a day after Bayern Munich topped Barcelona, 4-0.
